pkgmetadata.longdescription: Country Data with Names, Capitals, Currencies, Populations, Time, Languages and so on // Obtain information about countries around the globe. Information for names, states, languages, time, capitals, currency and many more. Data source are 'Wikipedia' https://www.wikipedia.org, 'TimeAndDate' https://www.timeanddate.com and 'CountryCode' https://countrycode.org.
